registration.subject: Welcome to IPM Decisions
registration.body: Welcome to IPM Decisions! Thank you for registering your account, please click the button below to confirm your email. Confirmation must be made within 24 hours.

re_confirm_email.subject: Please confirm your IPM Decisions email
re_confirm_email.body: Please click the button below to confirm your email.

data_request.subject: Access requested to your IPM Decisions data
data_request.body: The user {0}, would like to access your farm data. Please log in to your account to accept or decline this request.

inactive_user.subject: IPM Decisions inactive account
inactive_user.body: Your account has been inactive for {0} months. This account will be deleted along with all associated data unless you log back in before {1}.
